name: chrelat3i
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1
body: |- wb(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, cat, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1))))

stmt.origin: mp2an(wb(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, cat, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1)))), wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch))
stmt.pretty: mp2an((c0 ⊆ c1 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ HAtoms,(s0 ⊆ c0 → s0 ⊆ c1))), c0 ∈ CH, c1 ∈ CH)

body.origin:
|- wb(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, cat, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1))))
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, cch)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wb(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, cat, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, cat, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1))))
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, cch)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wb(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, cat, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1)))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, cch)), wb(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, cat, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1)))))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wss(c0, c1), wral(s0, cat, wi(wss(cv(s0), c0), wss(cv(s0), c1))))
-| wcel(c0, cch)
-| wcel(c1, cch)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

comment: A consequence of the relative atomicity of Hilbert space: the ordering of Hilbert lattice elements is completely determined by the atoms they majorize. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
